title: McLean Says Pro Athletes Helping Support Staff
itunes:title: McLean Says Pro Athletes Helping Support Staff
description:
Joe McLean, Managing Partner at Intersect Capital, shares his thoughts on the difficulties with restarting sports in the U.S. He also talks about the advice he is giving athletes on managing their money during the pandemic.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
